sentences.en: Angulation of hindquarters balances that of forequarters.
sentences.cn: 后腿及臂部有角的部位使其与前半部平衡.

sentences.en: Angulation of hindquarters should be in balance with forequarters.
sentences.cn: 后躯角度应与前躯平衡.

sentences.en: Back: The back is short, straight and muscular and firmly connects the withers to the hindquarters.
sentences.cn: 背: 背短 、 直、且肌肉发达.稳固地连接肩和后躯.

sentences.en: Coupling —— the area between the end of the rib cage and the beginning of the hindquarters.
sentences.cn: 这个部位位于最后一根肋骨到后驱最前端的距离.

sentences.en: Excess protein explains the huge hindquarters - but not the odd inheritance pattern.
sentences.cn: 过多的蛋白质可以解释有巨大臀腿部的出现,却未能解释为什麽会出现如此奇怪的遗传模式.

sentences.en: Feather on hindquarters and tail , long and profuse, less so on chest and back of forelegs.
sentences.cn: 后躯和尾巴的羽状饰毛十分丰富, 胸部和前肢后面的羽状饰毛略少一些.

sentences.en: Hindquarters should be wide and powerful with broad, well developed thighs.
sentences.cn: 后躯宽阔而有力,大腿宽, 且发达.

sentences.en: Hindquarters When standing and viewed from the rear, the hind are moderately spaced and parallel.
sentences.cn: 当他站立的时候从后面看, 后腿适度的间隔,平行且垂直.

sentences.en: Hindquarters When standing and viewed from the rear, the hind legs are moderately spaced and parallel.
sentences.cn: 后腿及臀部:当他站立的时候从后面看, 后腿适度的间隔,平行且垂直.

sentences.en: Moving away the hindquarters travel with moderate width between and the foot pads can be seen.
sentences.cn: 离去时,后腿间保持中等距离,可以看见脚垫.

sentences.en: Ribs long and well sprung but not barrel shaped, extending well towards hindquarters.
sentences.cn: 肋骨长、曲率良好,但不成桶形, 很好地延伸至后躯.

sentences.en: Steep, poorly angulated hindquarters are a serious fault.
sentences.cn: 过于倾斜和缺乏角度的后腿及臀部都是严重的缺点.

sentences.en: The hindquarters are of medium bone, angulated with muscular thighs and spaced moderately wide.
sentences.cn: 后躯骨量中等.大腿角度恰当,肌肉发达,距离略宽.

sentences.en: The Pekingese is a well - balanced, compact dog of a heavy front and lighter hindquarters.
sentences.cn: 北京犬是一种平衡良好, 结构紧凑的狗,前躯重而后躯轻.

sentences.en: Who got his hindquarters pecked to make you radiant, huh?
sentences.cn: 是谁为了让你成为瑞光猪不惜让自己的屁股被啄烂, 啊?

words.tran_cn: （动物的）尾部；两条后腿；半边胴体的后半部（hindquarter的复数）

trans.tran_en: the back part of an animal with four legs
